title: I used to be a Noxian like you
body:
https://youtu.be/lfddJmCM4G8

But then I got a shotgun in the knee

replies.body: I do not approve of your comment or the rework
I Garen-tee you no one, apart from you, was laughing.
I rolled urgot in aram, then I saw the rework post. Then I rolled him the next game, it must be a sign!
Urgot has chosen you to be one of his men
I got him from hextech few days ago
this fucking needs to get on the top tab this instant
But then I got a shotgun in the knee ... again ... and again .... and again , all 6 of them
{{champion:92}} I used to be a Noxian like you. But then I broke my blade with my knee.
